name: Marie Carmel Jean
bio: According to Boris Kravitz of the Haitian Art Company in Key West, Florida, Marie Carmel Jean was born in the mid-1960s. She was living in Carrefour, Haiti until her house burned down. Boris has not seen her since. [2002 conversation]

artworks.title: Mother and Daughter
description: Mother and Daughter was one of 25 Haitian paintings from this collection that were exhibited in the show Life in Bold Colors at Sonoma State University, Sonoma, California in 2007.

artworks.title: En Route
description: En Route was one of 25 Haitian paintings from this collection that were exhibited in the show Life in Bold Colors at Sonoma State University, Sonoma, California in 2007.
